programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: Amato and MechaBot are invited to a childrens show hosted by squirrel mascot Toopee, but things get weird really fast.

programme.title: Mr Bean The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Beans girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bears Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything?

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: The Bears become terribly ill and Chloe takes it upon herself to take care of them. But things get tricky when word of the Bears sickness goes viral.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin realise that the adult residents of Elmore are dangerously naive when it comes to being safe online. In fact they are in serious need of the boys help with even the simplest of tasks. And none more so than their mom, Nicole.

programme.title: Lucas The Spider
programme.desc: Findley discovers a boot that him and Lucas use as a castle.

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: A pack of wild raptors go after Min and Jane as theyre transporting a precious brontomelon in the medicine wagon, and in the ensuing chase they discover an act of kindness is often returned with kindness.

programme.title: Jessicas Big Little World
programme.desc: Jessica wants to learn to ride a big kid bike.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz
programme.desc: Dorothy presents Ozma with magical Best Friends necklaces.

programme.title: Mini Beat Power Rockers
programme.desc: The Power Rockers find one of Dr. Tokis gadgets that allows them to change their size.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: The Legion of Zoom is tired of always losing. They decide to take a page from the Batwheels and try using teamwork in order to pull off a daring heist. But will they be able to work together?

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Petunia invents an imaginary friend to help her always get her way.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the generals escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends help.

programme.title: The Untold Story of Singapores Public Housing
programme.desc: With new BTO launches regularly oversubscribed, is it a simple matter of supply not meeting demand? We examine the pushpull factors that the government has to grapple with.

programme.title: Lost In Marseille
programme.desc: Bruno, a stayathome father of two, gets back in touch with his masculinity when his wife is kidnapped in Marseille. Instead of the planned holiday on the Cte dAzur, Bruno gets deeper and deeper into an intrigue, pursued by police and mafia.

programme.title: Wajma, An Afghan Love Story
programme.desc: In conservative Kabul, young Wajma discovers she is pregnant out of wedlock. Her boyfriend denies paternity and her father locks her up for being a disgrace. Driven by desperation, Wajma takes extreme measures forcing everyone to rethink their actions.

At the same time, Lithuania has one of the highest numbers of low wage workers in the EU, and more than 300 000 people emigrated from the country in the last 10 years. So, is Lithuania really the best place for young people?

programme.title: Africas Wild Horizons 2
programme.desc: The Eastern Cape Province is investing heavily in ecotourism and conservation as an alternative to fishing and commercial development. The region is reclaiming farmlands and closing fishing grounds for wildlife. This is one of the most exciting conservation success stories in Africa.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for its wildlife.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but lifesaving surgery.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: BOSAI

programme.title: Medical Frontiers

programme.title: NHK NEWS 7

programme.title: Journeys in Japan
programme.desc: A photographer ascends to heavenly Koyasan, a Shingon Buddhist complex where visitors stay in temple lodgings, meditate, dine on vegetarian cuisine and walk through a massive cemetery at night.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the days news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Baby Sharks Big Show!

programme.title: Sharkdog

programme.title: Sharkdog

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.desc: Chef wants to host dinner and a show, but struggles when he cant seem to get any of his magic tricks right. Chef aims to make an EXTREME snack for Henrys EXTREME cousin, but he accidentally makes his spicy cauliflower bites too spicy!

programme.desc: Raphs strength wont save him when hes caught between the Mechazoids and the notorious street gang known as Purple Dragons! Raphs going to have to use his head to get out of this one!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Afraid theyll be forgotten, Lincoln and Clyde want to make a splash in the yearbook and crash group photos. Seeing his sisters fight with their roommates, Lincoln suggests a room shuffle based on a compatibility test.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: With prankster Luan at camp for April Fools Day, the Louds think theyre safe. That is, until they break down in front of an unusual motel. The kids discover Dad isnt at his IT job anymore and is now a dishwasher.

programme.title: The Thundermans Undercover
programme.desc: After a training accident causes a glitch in Chloes powers, Max and Phoebe look for a cure. After Max thinks hes solved the issue, he allows Chloe to attend a party with friends, but his treatment creates brand new powers Chloe cant control.

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.desc: When a report comes out that Kid Dangers super power is actually an illness, Kid Danger has to convince Swellview that it is a huge misunderstanding.

programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the AuvergneRhneAlpes region.

programme.title: ROCKY & LILY CEST DANS LA BOTE !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But whats inside? One thing is certain, its bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: LES SOUVENIRS DE MAMETTE
programme.desc: Today a friendly 80yearold grandmother, Mamette was once a headstrong young girl. At the age of nine, she discovered country life with no Internet or mobile phone. A great opportunity for plenty of adventures with her friends, when not taking part in the harvest or rearing goats!

programme.title: LES SUPERPOUVOIRS DU VIVANT
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: FOOT GO
programme.desc: Eight yearold Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isnt allowed to after all shes a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: ALIX ET LES MERVEILLEUX
programme.desc: Alix is excited about the idea of getting back to her friends in the land of the Wonderfolk. Unfortunately for her, Big Boss has set them to work on an endless list of jobs.

programme.title: TRAVERS CHAMPS
programme.desc: According to specialists on the issue, 50 of farmers suffer from psychological distress. Its a profession with high levels of stress and huge responsibilities, which are often assumed alone or as a couple.

programme.title: UN SI GRAND SOLEIL
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lvy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France.
